nodes.text: Zaadja was a planet located in the Savareen sector of the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories. During the Clone Wars between the Galactic Republic and Confederacy of Independent Systems, Senator Onaconda Farr, who represented Rodia and the entire sector in the Galactic Senate, brokered a deal with the Confederacy. In exchange for food from the Trade Federation, the Confederacy would be given exploitation rights on planets in the sector, such as Zaadja, Nelvaan, and Christophsis.

Zaadja was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Rise of the Separatists, a 2019 supplement to Fantasy Flight Games' series of Star Wars Roleplaying products. The planet initially appeared in the Star Wars Legends continuity in the Star Wars: Republic series' sixty-seventh issue Forever Young written by Randy Stradley and published by Dark Horse Comics in 2006.
